mapper.update: UPDATE article set pageView=pageView+1 WHERE id=#{aid}

#{aid}
mapper.delete:

mapper.select: SELECT a.*,t.`tagName`,t.`id` AS tid,u.`nickname`,c.`cateName` FROM article a LEFT JOIN article_tags ats ON a.`id`=ats.`aid` LEFT JOIN tags t ON ats.`tid`=t.`id` LEFT JOIN user u ON a.`uid`=u.`id` LEFT JOIN category c ON a.`cid`=c.`id` WHERE a.id=#{aid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pv(countDate,pv,uid) SELECT CURRENT_DATE(),totalPv-pv,t.`uid` FROM pvview p,totalpvview t WHERE p.`uid`=t.`uid`
mapper.select: SELECT countDate from pv WHERE uid=#{uid} ORDER by countDate limit 7
SELECT pv from pv WHERE uid=#{uid} ORDER by countDate limit 7
